record.field: Default value "%(value)s" in "%(name)s" is invalid according to its type.
The field type in "%(name)s" is not valid for default values.
In "%(name)s" default value use 0 for False, and any other integer for True.
Default date value in "%(name)s" is not valid. Check locale format and configure the template language.
Default value in "%(name)s" should be the id of a valid resource of the model picked in 'Related model'.
The resource set as default value in "%(name)s" is not valid or it does not exist.
There cannot be two columns with the same alias in an interface.
You cannot delete a Compilation in "Done" state
The charset of the file does not match the one defined in the interface.
